page.title: 09EDUCATION HALWELL&MORELEIGH
page.content: There are no educational facilities in either Halwell or Moreleigh. The village of Harbertonford 5km away has a playgroup and a rising fives pre-school group. Primary school education is at Harbertonford Church of England School for children aged 5 to 11. Secondary education is at King Edward V1 College in Totnes 10km away - Lower School, Main School and Kennicott House 6th Form. Further Education is provided by the Technical College at Torquay, College of Arts and Polytechnic at Plymouth. At Exeter there is a University. A wide range of day and evening courses are offered during the Winter months at Totnes and Kingsbridge for adults. During primary and secondary education pupils are transported by bus free of charge.
